mapper.insert: insert into thesis_list values( thesis_code_seq.nextval, #{user_id}, nvl(#{thesis_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, null), nvl(#{publication_date, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, null), nvl(#{publisher, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, null), nvl(#{thesis_url, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, null), nvl(#{contents, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, null), nvl(#{writer, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, null) )
